text: Hubaal Saffa iyo Marwa waxay ka mid yihiin calaamooyinka uu cayimay Allaah. Ee qofkii u soo Xajiyaa Beydka ama soo siyaarta (Cumro inuu guto), ma jiro wax eed ah oo ka saarani inuu ku dawaafo labadaa dhexdood28, oo qofkii iskiis u fala khayr badan, haddaba hubaal Allaah waa Mahad naqe, wax kasta Ogsoon
